title: Barcelona "Hand" Win to Inter
description:
The FC panel discuss Inter's controversial victory over Barcelona and the difficult position Xavi's men face to get our of the group stage in the Champions League. Plus, Jurgen Klopp goes back to his pressing ways in Liverpool's win over Rangers, and Tottenham don't have enough juice to get by Frankfurt.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Handball controversy surrounds Inter's win against Barcelona; Liverpool back to pressing ways; Tottenham can't edge past Frankfurt
